website_summaries.verdict: Soft to the touch to take it easy on your floors, but can create a core burning workout.
pros: Feels good on the feet and helps kick start an effective ab routine
Also serves as a great gift that's affordable and ideal for the fitness fanatic in your life
Appreciated as an effective alternative to the gym
cons: Not effective on all surface types

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We use these sliders to workout and they work fairly well, except when you use on wood floors, you have to be on the exact middle of the circle otherwise it has a lot of friction against the floor. I would reccomend these to anyone for some great core work! We’re currently using them in the 80 day obsession program.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for to add a little more challenge to my workouts. Came as decribed!
customer_reviews.author: Shall

customer_reviews.title: So soft on one side so I can do barefoot if I want and perfect for any flooring on the other
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I imagined them to be and more! So soft on one side so I can do barefoot if I want and perfect for any flooring on the other. Did some exercises on my carpet & can definitely feel the burn 🔥 I’m going to order another for my hubby so he doesn’t steal mine! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Risaleigh

customer_reviews.title: ... below now that one will not slide will not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am very unsatisfied with this product I have owned them for 3 weeks and have only used them on non abrasive floors and it broke in the middle of my workout see picture below now that one will not slide will not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Very slick making them easier to use than some that get caught on the floor. They came in a few different colors which I always appreciate. I am working on some physical therapy exercises and these are perfect for what I am trying to improve!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s better for carpet than hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it because it’s practical and easy to store. I have hardwood floors and a small carpet area, I recommend it to be used on carpet because the friction scratches the plastic when used on hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my workout!
customer_reviews.text: I work out with a trainer and these sliders have added to our workouts. Making things appropriately difficult :) and appropriately fun!
customer_reviews.author: PattiKMO

customer_reviews.title: Nice full body workout
customer_reviews.text: Glides well on my hardwood floor, nice package, as described. You can do full body workout with this. Nice price. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debora B

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price but not good for workouts
customer_reviews.text: They do not offer much grip for your foot. I find my foot constantly slipping off mid workout. Super frustrating but they were pretty cheap to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good loops
customer_reviews.text: Good resistance loops for working out. They stretch without fear of breaking and they don’t stretch out after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Libick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome workout equipment
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted! They take your ab workouts to another level. This one even comes with a pamphlet with a ton of exercises to try out, which is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These work great on my area rug and hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Thankfulhouse

customer_reviews.title: I have done workouts where they just have you use towels but I have carpet so these were my best
customer_reviews.text: Simple but effective. I am still learning to work with then in the sense they keep slipping out from under my feet. I have done workouts where they just have you use towels but I have carpet so these were my best option
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Martinez

customer_reviews.title: If you wanna make your fat melt by screaming in pain buy these.
customer_reviews.text: Sweet little discs. Who knew these would provide an intense workout.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Using for 80 Day Obsession workouts
customer_reviews.text: These work good on all surfaces only I wish they were a little bit bigger in diameter. My foot is a size 11 (women’s) and my foot slips off of it. Other than that they work great. I bought them for my 80 Day Obsession workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Liberty

customer_reviews.title: Good for at home workouts
customer_reviews.text: I am doing a home workout series and needed slides to do the next program. They get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Julius

customer_reviews.title: Did not slide on my carpet or floor
customer_reviews.text: Slider DID NOT slide at all. Just a cheap piece of plastic. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good workout
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a friend. She loves them
customer_reviews.author: Letitia D. Parish

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on carpet
customer_reviews.text: These things are crap on carpet. And they’re really small. They do OK on hard floors but still not great.
customer_reviews.author: Asmus Fam

customer_reviews.title: With that said i can still work with it and would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far but it works! Did not give it 5 stars as it didnt glide smoothly on carpet which was what i really needed it for . With that said i can still work with it and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great accessory to any home gym. It came with a card that displayed several workout movements.
customer_reviews.author: sarita

customer_reviews.title: Don’t slide easily
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s just me but these do not slide easily
customer_reviews.author: Mary S-C

customer_reviews.title: They do the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use with 80 DO, work well on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look like made good ! Haven't used yet but will update once use.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Works on all types of flooring
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my sister and she loves them. Ordering a pair for myself soon!
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bootcamp workouts
customer_reviews.text: I bought several sets of these for my outdoor bootcamps. Slides great on mats and we had a great workout !
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: No cement floors
customer_reviews.text: Cannot use these on a cement floor, must use on a carpet then ok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feet slip off easily
customer_reviews.text: Feet slip off very easily and end up spending more time adjusting them than Exercising. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: C and M's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t work at all for me. They didn’t slide well and the plastic/foam were super thin.
customer_reviews.author: Marc hooks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a shag carpet and these glide really well over the carpet
customer_reviews.author: EmilyB

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the product. Really makes you workout and sweat.
customer_reviews.author: MARCELA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Great quality and just what I was looking for :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These sliders work perfectly for my Beachbody exercises. Very slippery on the floor (which is the point lol).
customer_reviews.author: Jeshua Barnes

customer_reviews.title: description says its a set graphic stats its a two ...
customer_reviews.text: description says its a set graphic stats its a two pack. A bit misleading i thought there was 4 in this shipment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product! I get a great workout from them.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunta Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I liked the concept of these. But they barely slide I felt like I had to put in extra work to make it slide
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J

customer_reviews.title: I've gotten a awesome workout since these slides have arrived
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten a awesome workout since these slides have arrived. Easy to use and they come with a workout sheet of different moves!
customer_reviews.author: V Nol

customer_reviews.title: I’ve only used these on carpet and they’ve worked great. They’re a great size
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used these on carpet and they’ve worked great. They’re a great size. I’m a women’s 9 and my feet fit perfectly. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the way the work on a concrete basement floor.
customer_reviews.author: KARIE APKE

customer_reviews.title: storage bag
customer_reviews.text: love the storage bag to keep all the items together
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Just wish it came with more workouts. Just YouTubed a bunch
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Finlay

customer_reviews.title: ... workouts seem effortless with the discs and it feel like I can complete more reps
customer_reviews.text: My workouts seem effortless with the discs and it feel like I can complete more reps. Very convenient. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Sims

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I use them almost everyday. They are easy to travel with as well. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use them every single day. Very durable. Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Willis

customer_reviews.title: Not that effective
customer_reviews.text: They are good but the don slide as much I would like to.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the at home/travel gym, have been working well for me.
customer_reviews.author: marco

customer_reviews.title: Slide really well
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and slide on the floor well. Would recommend to others for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tsurumoto

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They do not slide well on all types of carpet but do well on hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Many cool workouts with these
customer_reviews.text: Don't regret my purchase. Many cool workouts with these things
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Vijoel

product_meta.title: SYOURSELF Core Exercise Sliders Dual Sided Gliding Discs-2 Pieces-Fitness Used on Carpet or Hardwood Floors for Abdominal,Total Body Workouts,Physical Therapy,Crossfit,Gym+Gift Box
feature_bullets: 2 Pack Dual-sided core sliders: Fabric Surface + Plastic Surface. Made for most surfaces. You can better exercise your core with our dual side fitness discs. Fabric foam side for hard floor, wood or tile. Plastic side for soft floor carpet, rug or cloth face, work on all surfaces for maximum convenience. Either at home or at the gym use our Core Sliders on any surface.

Lightweight and Great for Gym, Home, Travel: Come with 2 discs, 7" diameter and 0.3" thickness, best size, more convenient, easy to store and incredibly portable. 190g, so light and compact that you can pack them in any bag and take them wherever you travel. Take them to the gym or if its more time efficient and convenient, stay at home and still get an awesome home workout.

Core Exercise & Aerobic exercise : Improve strength and flexibility. For body building, those abdominal trainers can easily help you achieve the abdominal muscles target any muscle group to tone your body, increase strength, tightening your core, improve your overall body composition and cardio. For slim down, toning your tummy, legs or arms will be never be an issue again

Train Smarter Not Harder: Sliding exercises can be done anywhere and have been proven to reduce risk of injury since they consist of low impact movements. This will ensure that you get more out of each training with less stress on your joints.
Best Gift Idea: 2 x Gliding Discs, 1 x Gift Box. Gift package, come with a gift box, make it easy warp as gift for your family members, friends, especially for sports enthusiasts, slimmers.
